content: repeat across needle 2 will begin the heel if the toe measures 1 5 you will start the heel 1 5 short of your overall foot length cuff and finishing example if the total foot measures 10 and the toe measures 2 you when you reach your desired length begin the cuff by working in k1 p1 will knit until the piece including the toe measures 8 total before rib for 15 rounds starting the heel bind off all stitches using jeny s surprisingly stretchy or stretchy bind off of your choice leaving a 6 tail weave in all ends continue working in stockinette until you reach your determined heel starting point measurements begin second sock in the same manner using chart 2 2 all text and photos ©reneerockwood not to be reproduced or sold without prior written consent fuck ice socks by renee rockwood chart 1 3 all text and photos ©reneerockwood not to be reproduced or sold without prior written consent fuck ice socks by renee rockwood chart 2 4 all text and photos ©reneerockwood not to be reproduced or sold without prior written consent
